title: Bechno Kid's Hideout - JSON Feed
description: The latest (and greatest?) from a beet disguised as a masked humanoid entity.
user_comment: This is a JSON feed. You can subscribe by copying the URL from the address bar into your newsreader!

items.title: Feb 9, 2026
items.content_html:
Added a new section for affiliates in my links section!

If you'd like to be an affiliate, just shoot me an email at bechnokid@yahoo.com!

The only requirements I have is that your website isn't just an "About Me" page. Not that those are bad or anything, but I love sites with a ton of content in it, whether it's art, blogging, writing, anything!

That's it for now! Have a great day, everyone!

items.title: Feb 7, 2026
items.content_html:
Whoa, two updates in a week? It's almost unheard of!

Here's what's in today's update!

  • New tutorial! This one is for adding full descriptions to "prettified" RSS Feeds.
  • The old guestbook has returned! Yippee!!
  • Added a section for pending webrings.
  • Other fixes such as:
    • Reorganizing and cleaning up a lot of pages
    • Culling some of the quiz results and putting them in my /about page.

That's it for now! I hope all of you have a great day!

items.title: Feb 5, 2026
items.content_html:
Hello, everyone! I hope things are going ok for all of you! It's still pretty cold, but I hear that it'll get warmer next week! Just in time for my birthday!

Here's what's new in this update!

  • I moved the light/dark toggle button to be positioned below the navigation sidebar! I figured this might be easier to access since the sidebar is always fixed in one position.
  • New art in the anime section!
  • Added a new code snippet. I think Tumblr veterans might recognize this one. ðŸ˜‰
  • Updated now and pixel club pages!
  • I will also mention that I also added in new links, but seeing as how I seem to always add in new links with every update, I figure I won't announce it this time. ðŸ˜…

That's it for now. See you next time!

items.title: Jan 29, 2026
items.content_html:
Hello everyone! I hope you are all doing well. We all experienced a pretty nasty cold front over here in the East Coast, which makes me all the more grateful that I've been working from home. I hope you are all staying warm this winter!

Here are the latest updates!

  • New art in the Anime and Other sections!
  • Lots of new goodies, including:
    • Two more Pocket Bishounen quizzes to take.
    • Lots of graphics I adopted
    • Some graphics I collected for pixel clubs
  • Added more links! One day, I'll be brave and ask some of these new sites to be affiliates! One day!
  • Various bug fixes and minor updates

That's it for now! I hope you all of a wonderful day!

items.title: Jan 15, 2026
items.content_html:
Happy New Year everyone! Today is also the day that the long-awaited version 3.0 of Animal Crossing New Horizons is released! I hope everyone has fun with it.

There are some pretty big updates today:

  • New artwork in the Games section! This is technically a crossover piece, but I don't have enough to make a new section yet lol
  • New page: Fangirling, a page that's just me rambling about my experiences and preferences as a fan of media!
  • Status Cafe themes:
    • Did a huge rehaul by improving how a theme is previewed and installing a button that will copy the code to your clipboard, making it easy to just paste it into the text box for the About section,
    • Added a new theme! Those from Neocities in 2022-2023 might recognize it lol. I'm being a little shameless with this one hehe.
  • Added some more links! The more links I move from my bookmarks to this page, the more cool websites I keep finding. This is what I love about the indie web hehe.

That's it for now. I hope everyone has a great day!

items.title: Dec 30, 2025
items.content_html:
Hi everyone! I hope everyone has had a good time during the winter holidays. This will be the last update for the year. :D

There are so many changes in this update that I'm not sure if I can put them all in this single entry without it being too overwhelming. XD

So, I'll list the most important ones (to me)!

  • New artwork in the Digimon section
  • Made a to-do list for the site
  • Added two links
  • Meadow's guestbook service is currently down, so I linked to my atabook instead. Hopefully it gets fixed soon!
  • Optimization updates (hopefully):
    • Consolidated most of my JS files into one
    • Fixed up JS for webrings page

items.title: Dec 8, 2025
items.content_html:
Hi everyone! It's another cold day in December. We actually had one snow day here! We sadly haven't had snow since then, but I'm holding out hop that it will snow on Christmas!

This update seems pretty small, but that's because most of the updates were on the back end! However, an update is still an update!

Here are the latest changes:

  • Added new clique: Crystallizing. Yes, I chose that gem specifically because of that one animanga, teehee.
  • Updated RSS and made into page that holds other feeds
  • Cosmetic updates including:
    • Unifying colors, especially colors for links
    • Updated 404 page image to better match my current look
  • Backend updates and fixes including:
    • Minifying and bundling CSS for optimization (hopefully the CSS is still readable to use as reference!)
    • Updated CSS and JS code for Freezeframe script thanks to FriendShapedPlant!

That's it for now! See you next time!
